cruise_name: K400 UNFORGETTABLE ITALY WITH ADRIATIC CRUISE
short_description: 18 days including Rome, Florence, Venice, Opatija, Split with Adriatic Cruise from Split To Trogir, Stari Grad, Hvar, Vis, Bisevo, Korcula, Mljet, Slano, Elafiti, Dubrovnik

features.included: 3 nights cruise from Dubrovnik to Split#Supreme category ship in a cabin with private bathroom,#air conditioning & LCD TV#Arrival shared transfer from Dubrovnik airport/hotel to Dubrovnik#port and departure from Split port to Split airport/hotel#Daily buffet breakfast#3 lunches, all with 3 courses and salad bar# Welcome dinner#Water dispenser#Complimentary coffee, tea and fresh fruits available daily#Professional Cruise Manager throughout#Daily cabin servicing#Whisper technology#Luggage handling#Free Wi-Fi on board#

itinerary.day_summary: You will be transferred from Dubrovnik’s airport or your Dubrovnik’s hotel to harbour, where embarkation begins at 1:00 PM. Get settled in your cabin before attending a Welcome Reception followed by dinner this evening.
